name: #15 Jayadhrata
description:
One of the fiercest warrior loyal to Kurava. Jayadhrata married to the only female in Kurava siblings, Dursilawati. In the Great War, Jayadhrata able to stop the advance of the Pandavas trying to save entrapped Abimanyu, thus becoming the man responsible for the young hero's death.

In the next day following Abimanyu's death, Arjuna swore to kill Jayadhrata with his own hand. With the help of Kresna, Arjuna finally fulfill the oath and managed to cut Jayadhrata's head with an arrow.
